features: Comes in a collectible, branding packingSpecifications
body.description: Get ready for the ultimate showdown in a world where street fighting is the main event. Revisit the world of your favorite characters from the Street Fighter II video game, now as 1:12 scale action figures by Jada Toys. Known for his highly skilled martial arts training and strength, Ryu is in full force battle mode and ready to face his foes. He comes equipped with alternate hands, head, and Ryu’s signature attack: Hadoken (a blue fireball) for the ultimate punch. This 6” figure comes in arcade style packaging with features inspired from the game. In this world, you control how Ryu fights. Let the battle begin!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The best action figure of 2023
reviews.reviewText: A lot of toy companies are doing amazing thing, but no one is doing what Jada Toys is doing with their Street Fighter 2 line.Sculpt: 10/10Articulation: 10/10Value: 10/10This is the best Ryu action figure we've ever gotten. I love the sculpt which is a hybrid of classic SF2 art and inspiration from SF5. While I would have preferred that it was more vintage inspired, I can live with some of the modern deco updates (i.e: red gloves instead of brown. and a slimmer build). Of all the Ryu figures that has been made, I do prefer Jada's take the best. The portrait is phenomenal does its best trying to capture the look from the in-game select menu.Perhaps the most superior thing about Jada's Ryu is its articulation. For once, we're able to hit just about every one of Ryu's iconic game sprites. The attention to articulation engineering is masterful and you can tell serious love was put into it. The gi is also made out of an incredibly soft flexible plastic that doesn't hinder waist and torso articulation. From the hurricane kick, Hadoken to the Shoryuken, Ryu can do them all! The joints might feel a bit stiff at first, but once you break it in they are purposeful and smooth.In terms of value, you're getting a once in a life time, end all be all, Ryu figure along with Hadoken hands, a fireball and fireball stand, and an angry screaming head for $27 and some change after tax. Could there have been more accessories? Probably? But we have all the essentials and I am more than satisfied with the pack out.If you're a SF2 fan or just a figure fan, Ryu is a must get along with Jada's entire SF2 line up. The figure is hand candy and I will be all in with this line as long as the same craftsmanship and love continues with it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Very sturdy, perfectly poseable and super playworthy! I love this figure!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars You must defeat my Dragon Punch to stand a chance!
reviews.reviewText: Just like my review for Jada Toys' Fei Long figure, this Ryu figure is absolute perfection for beginner collectors! You get great value for your money. It has excellent articulation with pinless joints, a decent amount of accessories, and fantastic theme related packaging that is perfect for inbox collectors. This new Street Fighter action figure line is a great entry point for people who cannot afford Storm Collectibles or SH Figuarts own series of Street Fighter toys. If you love Street Fighter and love toys you owe it to yourself to get on board the Jada Toys train!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Exactly as expected. Comes with extra head/facial expressions, hands that you can change out, and fireball thing. My son loves it and is super happy with his new street fighter toy! Would definitely recommend buying!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great figure for price!
reviews.reviewText: My first figure from this line and if this is the quality i can expect for future waves, then I'm excited! Great value for the price. Highly articulated for posing with accessories. Not much else i can ask for. Arrived in good condition and on schedule. Would highly recommend for 1/12 scale collectors.

La verdad he visto otras figuras, que si me parecen buenas pero son muchísimo más caras, esta figura lo tiene todo a un súper precio. Mucho detalle, muy buenos movimientos, el molde me gustó porque es igual a la imagen de Ryu que tengo en los recuerdos. Súper recomendada.

Arrived a little bit late, 2-3 days late I should say. But I’m not complaining. The most important part is - the seller contacted me and gave me a heads up that my package will be a bit late, I appreciate that, I like the fact that they also monitor and tracking the deliver.About the item itself; The item arrived in a perfect condition. As described on the picture. Not a single damage or tear or rip on the package. As a collector I prefer keep my action figures in packages, they preserve well. Basically, Well done to the seller! Definitely recommend!

Brutal figura! Vale cada centavo y es un excelente producto por el precio que se paga. Buena pintura y escultura. Excelente articulación y una cantidad decente de accesorios. Además la caja también es bonita. Espero con muchas ganas el resto de las figuras de esta serie

Fue un regalo para mi hijo de 12 años, ha jugado con el, y aún se mantiene unido, a diferencia de algunos otras figuras que se desgastan de las articulaciones.Parece bien detallado y los accesorios lo hacen buena pieza de colección para posar.

Que figura mas bonita y es que por su precio es sorprendente ya que deja muy mal a otras compañias que sacan figuras de esta misma escala (hasbro) y las deja en ridiculo ya que esta trae manos intercambiables un rostro intercambiable y hasta un efecto de poder con todo y una base para este y es que trae tanto que hasta parece un robo ya que otras compañias para darte esto o la hacen de lujo o su precio es mucho mayor ya hablando de la figura es hermosa trae articulaciones pinless y su pintado es exelente y no se diga su blister te encantara ya que simula una arcade de los 80' en conclusion cuando una compañia hace las cosas con amor para sus fans se ve, gracias jada toys por volver a hacer que cualquiera disfrute de volver a coleccionar.
